label: Task-4
title: Automate IAM role lifecycle
description: Create app__deploy__aws__iam component class with full lifecycle for the Lambda execution role. Currently IAM role creation is commented out in test_3__create_lambda_iam_user. Implement: create() for Lambda execution role with trust policy, exists() to check role exists, verify() to confirm attached policies are correct, lock_down() to apply least-privilege policy, delete() to remove role and policies, verify_deleted() to confirm removal.

properties.acceptance_criteria: IAM role created programmatically with correct trust policy and permissions. Full lifecycle works. Least-privilege policy applied. AppSec role reviews the IAM policy.
